snippet: Mason Katz singled home Tyler Moore in the bottom of the 12th inning, lifting Louisiana State University to a 5-4 victory over Stony Brook in a thrilling N.C.A.A. tournament game that took two days to complete.
lead_paragraph: Mason Katz singled home Tyler Moore in the bottom of the 12th inning, lifting Louisiana State University to a 5-4 victory over Stony Brook in a thrilling N.C.A.A. tournament game that took two days to complete.

headline.seo: Stony Brook Falls to L.S.U. in Twelve Innings
headline.main: Stony Brook Falls to L.S.U. in 12 Innings
headline.print_headline: Stony Brook Falls to L.S.U. in 12 Innings
